UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: The synergistic antimicrobial effects of novel bombinin and bombinin H peptides from the skin secretion of Bombina orientalis
Literature.Author: Xiang J, Zhou M, Wu Y, Chen T, Shaw C, Wang L

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Horse erythrocytes:50% hemolysis=>512 µg/ml,Human microvascular endothelial cells HMEC-1:50% Cell death=104.23±0.24 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 10788(MIC=128µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 12493(no activity data),Escherichia coli NCTC 10418(no activity data),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(no activity data),Candida albicans NCPF 1467(no activity data)
